title: Java Training at Solitaire Infosys
description: Successfully completed 6-weeks Java training at Solitaire Infosys, Mohali. Many key skills acquired in this period such as Data Structure and Algorithms, OOPS , Problem solving and debugging techniques. This training enhanced my programming skills in Java, improved understanding of software development life-cycle.

title: Web Development Intern at internPE
description: Successfully completed 4-weeks Web Development internship at internPE. I learn many key concepts in this period and gained hand-on expreience in web development. This internship enhanced my problem solving skills and development skills and at last but not least this internship give me confidence in development.
